categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Ram Bergman is a film producer who produced Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, as well as Rian Johnson's previous three films, Brick, The Brothers Bloom and Looper. He and Johnson had cameos as Death Star technicians in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
In 2015, Bergman produced A Tale of Love and Darkness, Natalie Portman's directorial debut.
